ARABIC: وَإِذَا عَلِمَ مِنْ ءَايَٰتِنَا شَيْـًٔا ٱتَّخَذَهَا هُزُوًا أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُّهِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When he does learn something of Our Signs, he makes a mockery of them. Such people will have a humiliating punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When he comes to know something of Our messages he makes fun of them: For them is shameful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Whenever he comes to know anything of Our Signs, he makes them an object of jest. For such there awaits a humiliating chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When he learns about some of Our revelations, he mocks them. Such people will suffer a humiliating torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when he comes to know about any of the verses, he mocks at it; for them is a disgraceful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when he learns something of Our Ayat, he makes them a jest. For such there will be a humiliating torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when he comes to know of any of Our communications, he takes it for a jest; these it is that shall have abasing chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And when he knows anything of Our signs, he takes them in mockery; those for them awaits a humbling chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when he knoweth aught of Our revelations he maketh it a jest. For such there is a shameful doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When he learns something of Our revelations, he derides them: for such there will be humiliating torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when he cometh to know aught of Our revelations, he taketh it scoffingly. These! theirs shall be a torment ignominous;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Should he learn anything about Our signs, he takes them in derision. For such there is a humiliating punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And when he learns something of Our Signs, he takes them in jest: for such there will be a humiliating Penalty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when he learns something of Our Verses (this Quran), he makes them a jest. For such there will be a humiliating torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As for he who knows something of Our verses and then mocks them for those there is a humiliating punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when he learns something of Our revelations, he takes them in mockery. For such there is a shameful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when he knows anything of Our verses, he takes them in ridicule. Those will have a humiliating punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [45:9] And should he come to know anything of Our signs, namely, the Qur’ān, he takes them in mockery. For such, liars — there is a degrading chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when he knoweth) and when he hears (aught of Our revelations he maketh it a jest) a mockery. (For such) for people like al-Nadr Ibn al-Harith (there is a shameful doom) there is a severe torment.
